name: Antwerp–Rotterdam–North Sea Port
description: Supra-cluster of Antwerp, Rotterdam, North Sea Port, Zeebrugge; high ISPS pressure, drug crime, contractor overlap.

name: Spanish Triad (Algeciras–Valencia–Barcelona)
description: Major Spanish container and RoRo hubs with shared ferries, customs and smuggling pressure.

name: Italian Ligurian–Tuscany Cluster
description: Genoa, La Spezia, Livorno, Piombino; mix of container, RoRo, bulk; mandate-driven environment.

name: Portugal Energy & Container Corridor
description: Sines, Lisbon, Setúbal; strong energy/strategic focus.

name: HAROPA (Le Havre–Rouen–Paris)
description: Centralized French river–sea corridor; strong customs and state control.

name: Germany North (Hamburg–Bremerhaven–Wilhelmshaven)
description: Major German container and RoRo hubs; moves later but locks hard.

name: Greece (Piraeus–Thessaloniki–Crete)
description: High geopolitical sensitivity; COSCO presence and migration/smuggling routes.

name: Eastern Security Corridor
description: Gdansk/Gdynia, Klaipeda, Riga, Tallinn, Constanta, Varna/Burgas; EU funding leverage and ISPS gaps.

name: UK East Coast Container Spine
description: Felixstowe, London Gateway, Tilbury; major UK container gateway with strong customs and Border Force presence.

name: Humber Energy & Bulk Cluster
description: Immingham, Hull; UK's largest port by tonnage; critical energy and bulk hub.

name: Solent & Channel Gateway
description: Southampton, Portsmouth; major automotive, container, cruise, and ferry hub with strong border control relevance.

name: UK Irish Sea Cluster
description: Liverpool; key RoRo and Irish Sea trade corridor.

name: Nordic Scandi Turntable (Gothenburg–Aarhus–Öresund)
description: Gothenburg, Aarhus, Copenhagen/Malmö; largest Nordic ports; key Baltic–North Sea connector.

name: Nordic Gulf of Finland Cluster
description: Helsinki, Hamina-Kotka; high ferry and RoRo identity volumes; strategic eastern border hub.

name: Nordic Norway Energy Cluster
description: Oslo, Stavanger; main Norwegian container gateway and offshore oil & gas logistics hub.
